message.content: {"responses": [{"question_id": "TT4G35A", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence helps teachers write or improve lesson plans.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35B", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence enables teachers to adapt learning material to different students' abilities.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35C", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence assists teachers in supporting students individually.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35D", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence supports students with specific needs (e.g. multilingual learners, students with special education needs).", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35E", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence helps teachers automate administrative tasks.", "response": "Strongly agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35F", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence enables students to misrepresent others' work as their own.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35G", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence makes recommendations that may not be appropriate or correct.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35H", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence amplifies biases that reinforce students' misconceptions.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35I", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence jeopardises the privacy and security of student data.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35J", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence suggests unsuitable pedagogical approaches that teachers would use with students.", "response": "Agree"}]}
message.reasoning_content:
I need to respond as a primary or secondary school teacher from Azerbaijan to this survey about AI in education. I should provide thoughtful, balanced responses that reflect a realistic teacher's perspective on the benefits and risks of AI in education.

Let me think through each statement:

[TT4G35A]: AI helps teachers write or improve lesson plans - This is generally true, AI can assist with this. I would say "Agree"

[TT4G35B]: AI enables teachers to adapt learning material to different students' abilities - This is a capability AI can provide, though it depends on implementation. I would say "Agree"

[TT4G35C]: AI assists teachers in supporting students individually - AI can help provide personalized support. I would say "Agree"

[TT4G35D]: AI supports students with specific needs - AI can provide accessibility features and customized learning. I would say "Agree"

[TT4G35E]: AI helps teachers automate administrative tasks - Definitely true, AI can handle grading, scheduling, attendance, etc. I would say "Strongly agree"

[TT4G35F]: AI enables students to misrepresent others' work as their own - This is a real concern with AI like ChatGPT. This is a risk/challenge. I would say "Agree" (acknowledging it's a real concern)

[TT4G35G]: AI makes recommendations that may not be appropriate or correct - AI can make mistakes and give inappropriate suggestions. I would say "Agree"

[TT4G35H]: AI amplifies biases that reinforce students' misconceptions - This is a documented concern. I would say "Agree"

[TT4G35I]: AI jeopardises the privacy and security of student data - This is a legitimate concern with data collection and storage. I would say "Agree"

[TT4G35J]: AI suggests unsuitable pedagogical approaches - AI can suggest approaches that don't match educational best practices or classroom context. I would say "Agree"


Now I'll formulate my responses based on these assessments.
